source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 889,923 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 341,467.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Legplates of Hidden Stars

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to imbue you with Sanctified Swiftness, granting 76 Speed stacking up to 10 times.

After receiving 10 stacks, release the stored energy dealing 563,493 Holy damage split between all enemies within 10 yards.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Azure Treads of the Kalu'ak

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 889,923 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 341,467.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,490, up to 12,453.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.7 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
